title: The Steam-driven adventures of Riverboat Bill
brief_description: Based on the Riverboat Bill books by Cliff Green. Riverboat Bill and young Dave Freshwater restore an old paddle steamer, and, along with a fire-breathing Bunyip and Black Ben the Pirate, have many adventures sailing the Murray River.
